headline: ChatGPT picks 3 cryptocurrencies to buy with your $1,702 stimulus check
summary: About 600,000 Alaska residents are set to receive a $1,702 Permanent Fund Dividend payment in August. To qualify, applicants must have lived in Alaska for the entire year of 2023, not claimed residency elsewhere, avoided felony convictions, and remained in the state for at least 185 days. For residents looking to invest their checks, Finbold consulted OpenAI‚Äôs ChatGPT to build a custom cryptocurrency portfolio using the $1,702 amount. Notably, the AI model excluded Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum ( ETH ), instead focusing on promising altcoins. Solana (SOL) Solana ( SOL ) received the largest allocation at 40%, or approximately $681. As of press time, Solana was trading at $192.06, having emerged as one of the standout performers of the ongoing market rally. SOL price chart. Source: Finbold ChatGPT chose Solana due to its reputation as one of the fastest and most scalable layer-1 blockchains, with growing adoption in the payments and decentralized applications sectors. Its low transaction fees, robust developer ecosystem, and increasing institutional interest, including speculation around a potential Solana ETF, further solidify its long-term appeal. Chainlink (LINK) Chainlink ( LINK ) took the second spot with a 35% allocation, translating to about $596. According to ChatGPT, Chainlink plays a vital role in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem as the leading oracle network, bridging smart contracts with real-world data such as asset prices and weather. With the rise of tokenized real-world assets and DeFi protocols, the AI sees Chainlink as foundational infrastructure. Its expanding use cases and strategic partnerships make it a dependable mid-cap option. As of press time, LINK was trading at $19.13, up 1.1% in the last 24 hours. LINK price chart. At press time, the asset was trading at $4.37, having gained 1.8% in the last 24 hours. Render price chart. Source: CoinMarketCap Notably, Render is the most speculative of the three picks, tapping into one of 2025‚Äôs most compelling narratives: the convergence of artificial intelligence and blockchain. Render offers decentralized GPU rendering services, giving developers, artists, and AI researchers access to scalable compute power. With demand for AI infrastructure rising rapidly, ChatGPT sees Render as a high-upside opportunity. headline: BNB Hits Record High, Analysts Now Target $2K
summary: TL;DR BNB clears two-year resistance with volume support and 120K+ tokens bought by Nano Labs. Risk indicators show no overheated conditions, giving room for the rally to continue climbing. Windtree Therapeutics and others are securing millions to increase BNB holdings for treasury use. BNB Breaks Resistance and Pushes Higher BNB has moved above $855, setting a new all-time high. Analyst Crypto Patel confirmed the breakout and named $2,000 as the next major level to watch. He added that smart money stepped in as volume spiked and demand zones held firm. Nano Labs has reportedly accumulated more than 120,000 BNB. Meanwhile, BNB Chain‚Äôs decentralized exchange volume reached $190 billion this month, with on-chain transactions rising threefold since April. Risk Metrics Show No Overheating Joao Wedson, CEO of Alphractal, said BNB‚Äôs current Sharpe Ratio remains under 1.0. This level suggests the rally has not yet entered the high-risk zone often seen before local tops. Previous market peaks, such as in April‚ÄìMay 2021, saw the ratio rise well above this range. Wedson also pointed to the Normalized Risk Metric, which is now at 0.005. This number is low compared to earlier highs, showing that BNB is not trading under excessive pressure. According to Wedson‚Äôs analysis, the setup suggests more room for upward movement before risk signals begin flashing. Wedson noted that this pattern has often appeared when Bitcoin nears a short-term top or bottom. In previous cycles, sharp moves in this pair acted as early signs of broader changes in the market trend. As BNB gains strength against Ethereum, traders are watching for possible follow-through from Bitcoin and other large-cap assets. Treasury Activity and Large Purchases Increase Windtree Therapeutics, a biotech firm listed on Nasdaq, announced plans to add BNB to its reserves.
